revised_title: Researches on Hydrocarbons of the Series CnH2n+2 and the Boiling Points
tldr: The author investigates the hydrocarbons of the series CnH2n+2, specifically normal paraffins, and their boiling points. They describe new findings and the constitution of these hydrocarbons, as well as their formation and oxidation products. The author also discusses the boiling points of these hydrocarbons and their relationship to their chemical structure.
